actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating July 22, 1979 through July 28, 1979, as "Puerto Rican Constitution Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week of July 22 through July 28, 1979, as "Puerto Rican Constitution Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating July 22, 1979 through July 28, 1979, as "Puerto Rican Constitution Week".
